---
name: Documentation Update
about: Request improvements or additions to the documentation.
title: "[Docs] <short summary>"
labels: ["documentation"]
assignees: []
---

## Summary

Describe the documentation gap or improvement you are proposing.

## Location

List the files, sections, or URLs that need updating.

## Details

Provide the information that should be added, corrected, or removed. Include code snippets if relevant.

## Dependencies

List any related code changes, PRs, or feature flags that impact the documentation.

## Additional Context

Share screenshots, diagrams, or references that will help the writer.
